=== Profile ===
Hi, my name is Sheikh Imtiaz Rahi. Professionally, I'm a software developer working for an IT company. Personally, I'm 32 years old, married no kids yet.

I love GNU/Linux and use it at home and work. I want to see more and more people using Linux on their Desktop for their daily regular use. Thats why I try to persuade people to use any Linux distribution (specially Ubuntu) and help them understand the benefit of free software and GNU/Linux.

I am also involved with Fedora Project. View my <nowiki>[[http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/ImtiazRahi|profile]]</nowiki> there.
